Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and José Ramírez hit back-to-back homers in the eighth inning to put the Rays away, 6-1.
Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians knew they would need Josh Naylor and José Ramírez in October, but they didn't know what Lane Thomas would bring to the table when they acquired him from the Nationals on July 29.
Post-Match Reflections: The weight has been lifted off the shoulders of every fan at Progressive Field on Saturday night, when the Guardians' big bats came back to life with a much-needed victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians' lead in the American League Central remains at three games after the Royals won earlier in the day.
Others: The Guardians are now 39-19 when Josh Naylor has at least one RBI, and the team is hoping that Saturday was a good start to their lineup coming into the postseason.
